00060 class DmetGenotypeTest {
00061 
00062 public:
00063   int numPassed, numFailed;
00064   DmetGenotypeTest() {
00065     numPassed = 0;
00066     numFailed = 0;
00067   }
00068   void doRefBuild( const FsTestDir & );
00069   void doRefRun( const FsTestDir & );
00070   void doPlasmidRun( const FsTestDir & );
00071   string createString(const char **items, int size, const char *prefix, const char *suffix);
00072   // vector<string> m_cels;
00073   
00074 };

00076 string DmetGenotypeTest::createString(const char **items, int size, const char *prefix, const char *suffix) {
00077     string val = "";
00078     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00079         val = val + prefix + items[i] + suffix;
00080     }
00081     return val;
00082 }
00083 
00084 void DmetGenotypeTest::doRefBuild( const FsTestDir & testDir ) {
00085   
00086   std::string doRefBuildPath = Fs::join(testDir.asString(), "doRefBuild");
00087   
00088   string command = "./apt-dmet-genotype "
00089     "--batch-info=true "
00090     "--null-context=false "
00091     "--reference-input=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.genomic.ref.a5 "
00092     "--out-dir="
00093     + doRefBuildPath +
00094     " "
00095     "--cel-files=../../regression-data/data/idata/dmet-genotype/DMET_Plus/cels.small.txt "
00096     "--cdf-file=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.cdf "
00097     "--chrX-probes=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.chrXprobes "
00098     "--chrY-probes=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.chrYprobes "
00099     "--batch-name=dynamic-batch-1 "
00100     "--reference-output="
00101     + Fs::join(doRefBuildPath, "reference.a5 ") +
00102     "--region-model=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-region-models.txt "
00103     "--probeset-model=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-probeset-models.txt "
00104     "--probeset-ids=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.genomic.gt.ps "
00105     "--probeset-ids-reported=../../regression-data/data/idata/dmet-genotype/DMET_Plus/consent1.txt "
00106     "--cn-region-gt-probeset-file=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-gt.ps "
00107     "--cc-chp-output=true "
00108     "-- "
00109     "--summaries=true "
00110     "--feat-effects "
00111     "-- "
00112     "--text-output "
00113     "-- "
00114     "--table-output "
00115     "--feat-effects "
00116     "--summaries ";
00117 
00118   string name = "doRefBuild";
00119   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00120 
00121   vector<string> gold,gen;
00122   gold = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, "../../regression-data/data/idata/dmet-genotype/DMET_Plus/doRefBuild/chp/", ".dmet.chp");
00123   gen = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, Fs::join(doRefBuildPath, "chp") + "/", ".dmet.chp");
00124   
00125   checks.push_back(new CalvinChpCheck(gen, gold));
00126 
00127   // Run the test
00128   RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00129   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00130   if(!test.pass()) {
00131     Verbose::out(1, "Error in DmetGenotypeTest::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00132     numFailed++;
00133   }
00134   else {
00135     numPassed++;
00136   }
00137 }
00138 
00139 void DmetGenotypeTest::doRefRun( const FsTestDir & testDir ) {
00140   std::string doRefRunPath = Fs::join(testDir.asString(), "doRefRun");
00141 
00142   string command = "./apt-dmet-genotype "
00143     "--batch-info=false "
00144     "--null-context=true "
00145     "--reference-input=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.genomic.ref.a5 "
00146     "--out-dir="
00147     + doRefRunPath +
00148     " "
00149     "--cel-files=../../regression-data/data/idata/dmet-genotype/DMET_Plus/cels.small.txt "
00150     "--spf-file=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.spf "
00151     "--chrX-probes=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.chrXprobes "
00152     "--chrY-probes=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.chrYprobes "
00153     "--region-model=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-region-models.txt "
00154     "--probeset-model=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-probeset-models.txt "
00155     "--probeset-ids=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.genomic.gt.ps "
00156     "--probeset-ids-reported=../../regression-data/data/idata/dmet-genotype/DMET_Plus/consent2.txt "
00157     "--cn-region-gt-probeset-file=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-gt.ps "
00158     "--cc-chp-output=true "
00159     "--geno-call-thresh=0.01 "
00160     "-- "
00161     "--summaries=true "
00162     "--feat-effects "
00163     "-- "
00164     "--text-output "
00165     "-- "
00166     "--table-output "
00167     "--feat-effects "
00168     "--summaries";
00169 
00170   string name = "doRefRun";
00171   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00172 
00173   //Chp File Checks
00174 
00175   vector<string> gold,gen;
00176   gold = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, "../../regression-data/data/idata/dmet-genotype/DMET_Plus/doRefRun/chp/", ".dmet.chp");
00177   gen = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, doRefRunPath + "/chp/", ".dmet.chp");
00178 
00179   checks.push_back(new CalvinChpCheck(gen, gold));
00180 
00181   RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00182   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00183   if(!test.pass()) {
00184     Verbose::out(1, "Error in DmetGenotypeTest::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00185     numFailed++;
00186   }
00187   else {
00188     numPassed++;
00189   }
00190 }
00191 
00192 void DmetGenotypeTest::doPlasmidRun( const FsTestDir & testDir ) {
00193 
00194   std::string doPlasmidRunPath = Fs::join(testDir.asString(), "doPlasmidRun");
00195 
00196   string command = "./apt-dmet-genotype "
00197     "--reference-input=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.plasmid.ref.a5 "
00198     "--out-dir="
00199     + doPlasmidRunPath +
00200     " "
00201     "--cel-files=../../regression-data/data/idata/dmet-genotype/DMET_Plus/cels.small.txt "
00202     "--cdf-file=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.cdf "
00203     "--chrX-probes=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.chrXprobes "
00204     "--chrY-probes=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.chrYprobes "
00205     "--region-model=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.cn-region-models.txt "
00206     "--probeset-ids=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.plasmid.gt.ps "
00207     "--probeset-ids-reported=../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/DMET_Plus/DMET_Plus.r3.plasmid.gt.ps "
00208     "--cc-chp-output=true "
00209     "--geno-call-thresh=0.2 "
00210     "--run-cn-engine=false";
00211 
00212   string name = "doPlasmidRun";
00213   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00214 
00215   vector<string> gold,gen;
00216   gold = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, "../../regression-data/data/idata/dmet-genotype/DMET_Plus/doPlasmidRun/chp/", ".dmet.chp");
00217   gen = Util::addPrefixSuffix(m_cels, doPlasmidRunPath + "/chp/", ".dmet.chp");
00218 
00219   checks.push_back(new CalvinChpCheck(gen, gold));
00220 
00221   RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00222   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00223   if(!test.pass()) {
00224     Verbose::out(1, "Error in DmetGenotypeTest::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00225     numFailed++;
00226   }
00227   else {
00228     numPassed++;
00229   }
00230 }
00231 
00232 /** Everybody's favorite function. */
00233 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00234   try {
00235     DmetGenotypeTest test;
00236     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00237     FsTestDir testDir;
00238     testDir.setTestDir("dmet", true);
00239     test.doRefBuild( testDir );
00240     test.doRefRun( testDir );
00241     test.doPlasmidRun( testDir );
00242 
00243     Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed));
00244     return test.numFailed != 0;
00245   }
00246   catch(...) {
00247       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00248       return 1;
00249   }
00250   return 1;
00251 }
